definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
to gold-plate/to gild/(fig.) to make sth quite ordinary seem special
the coating of sth that has been chrome-plated or copper-plated etc

sentences.english: The nib is in white gold and is rhodium-plated.
sentences.chinese: 笔尖为白金且为铑被镀。

sentences.english: Brush plating technology for repairing the plastic dies has been adopted.
sentences.chinese: 利用电刷镀技术对塑料模具进行修复。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated pierced earrings with Jonquil crystal lemon and leaf in Peridot crystal.
sentences.chinese: 铑镀穿耳环与信奉水晶柠檬叶在橄榄石晶体。

sentences.english: Because it is a good plating layers of titanium and therefore will never decolorization .
sentences.chinese: 因为是镀了好几层钛银的，因此永远也不会脱色。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated hair clip with Jonquil crystal lemon and leaf in Peridot crystal.
sentences.chinese: 淡黄色的水晶柠檬配橄榄色的叶子，金属部分镀铑。

sentences.english: The tinning process of dry type current transformer is Electroplate Technology.
sentences.chinese: 传统干式电流互感器的镀锡工艺是采用槽镀镀锡技术。

sentences.english: That he is a buffoon with bathroom fixtures of gold?
sentences.chinese: 他是个小丑，家里的卫生间都镀着金？

sentences.english: Those copper articles were superficially brassed.
sentences.chinese: 那些铜制器具表面镀了一层黄铜。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated brooch with entwined clear crystal pavé loops.
sentences.chinese: 铑被镀的别针与被纠缠的清楚水晶铺圈。

sentences.english: To protect your eyes, wear sunglasses with a special coating that locks UV light.
sentences.chinese: 可戴镀有防紫外线膜的太阳镜来保护眼睛。

sentences.english: The process flow and formula of composite plating on taps were presented.
sentences.chinese: 给出了丝锥复合镀的工艺流程和工艺配方。

sentences.english: These are just examples which are representative of the multiplicity of applications for coil-coated materials.
sentences.chinese: 这些只是一些例子，代表了涂镀卷板材料的多样性。

sentences.english: Rhodium in rhodium plating bath was determined by spectrophotometry with sodium hypochlorite as chromogenic agent.
sentences.chinese: 用次氯酸钠作显色剂光度测定镀铑溶液中的铑。

sentences.english: Don't polish those badges; the gilt will wear off in time if you do.
sentences.chinese: 不要擦这些徽章，否则镀上去的金总有一天会磨掉的。

sentences.english: CAB Signal Banana, non magnetic, eutectic brass, Rhodium over silver plate.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉插，无磁性结晶黄铜，镀银上镀铑。

sentences.english: Complemented with a rhodium plated chain.

definition: the coating of sth that has been chrome-plated or copper-plated etc
Wen River in northwest Sichuan (same as 汶川)/classical name of river in Shandong, used to refer to Qi 齊國|齐国
to drape over one's shoulders/to open/to unroll/to split open/to spread out
